meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>water</kanji> <kanji>crystal</kanji> is just a <vocabulary>crystal</vocabulary>. I guess crystals are clear and look kind of like water, yeah? That's why it's being referred to as a water crystal, making it really just a crystal.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
